alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm northwest of Dubois tracking east toward and south of the Rock Creek Fire through 630 PM MDT... At 547 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 21 miles northwest of Dubois, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, small hail, brief moderate rain, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and create difficult conditions for fire fighters on area fires. Locations impacted include... Small and Edie School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Fire crews working near the Rock Creek fire should prepare for strong, gusty and erratic thunderstorm outflow winds through 630 PM MDT.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands
